title: Drug testing (anti-doping) certificates
dataVerified: Athlete name, DOB, test date, sample ID, testing authority
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Test status (clean/cleared). Link to testing authority system (athlete and federations, requires authentication)
rationale: WADA compliance. Domain binding verifies testing authority. Prevents fabricated clean tests. Regulatory forms suitable for OCR. Athlete eligibility verification. Long retention. Uses SHA-512 (athlete privacy).
